about.name: Doha
about.info_text: Doha is the vibrant capital of Qatar, located on the northeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula. This modern city is known for its stunning skyline, luxurious shopping, and a rich blend of tradition and innovation. Visitors can explore a wide range of cultural attractions, savor delicious cuisine, and experience the warmth of Qatari hospitality in a city that offers a fascinating mix of old and new.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 1.7 million (in the metropolitan area)
Country: Qatar
Time Zone: Arabian Standard Time (AST, UTC+03:00)
Official Language: Arabic
Currency: Qatari Riyal (QAR)
about.climate_text: Doha experiences a desert climate with hot, dry summers and mild winters. Summers can be scorching with temperatures often exceeding 40°C (104°F), while winters are pleasantly mild with temperatures around 15°C to 25°C (59°F to 77°F).

attractions_card.title: The Pearl-Qatar
attractions_card.description: The Pearl-Qatar is an artificial island renowned for its luxury living, marinas, shopping, and picturesque Mediterranean-style architecture.

attractions_card.title: Souq Waqif
attractions_card.description: Souq Waqif is a traditional Qatari market with bustling alleyways, cafes, restaurants, and shops selling a variety of goods.

attractions_card.title: Museum of Islamic Art
attractions_card.description: The Museum of Islamic Art houses an exceptional collection of Islamic art spanning over 1,400 years of history.

attractions_card.title: Katara Cultural Village
attractions_card.description: Katara Cultural Village is a hub for arts, culture, and heritage, featuring theaters, galleries, and diverse events.

attractions_card.title: Aspire Zone
attractions_card.description: Aspire Zone is a sports complex with world-class facilities, including the Khalifa International Stadium and Aspire Park.

attractions_card.title: Doha Corniche
attractions_card.description: Doha Corniche is a picturesque waterfront promenade with stunning views, perfect for a leisurely stroll or bike ride.

attractions_card.title: Qatar National Library
attractions_card.description: The Qatar National Library is a modern architectural marvel, a hub of knowledge, and a cultural center for the community.

attractions_card.alt: Mathaf: Arab Museum of Modern Art
attractions_card.title: Mathaf: Arab Museum of Modern Art
attractions_card.description: Mathaf is the leading institution for contemporary art from the Arab world, with a diverse collection of modern art.

food_card.title: Machboos
food_card.description: Machboos is a traditional Qatari dish made with rice, meat (often lamb or chicken), and a blend of aromatic spices.

food_card.title: Al Harees
food_card.description: Al Harees is a Ramadan specialty made with wheat and meat, slow-cooked to a porridge-like consistency.

food_card.title: Balaleet
food_card.description: Balaleet is a sweet and savory Qatari dish consisting of vermicelli noodles, saffron, and fried eggs.

food_card.title: Umm Ali
food_card.description: Umm Ali is a delectable dessert made with puff pastry, nuts, and cream, often referred to as the 'Egyptian bread pudding.'

food_card.title: Shawarma
food_card.description: Shawarma is a popular street food featuring marinated meat (often chicken or beef) wrapped in flatbread with various toppings and sauces.

hotels_card.title: The St. Regis Doha
hotels_card.description: The St. Regis Doha offers luxurious accommodations, exquisite dining, and a private beach along the Arabian Gulf.

hotels_card.title: Four Seasons Hotel Doha
hotels_card.description: The Four Seasons Hotel Doha boasts seaside elegance, exceptional service, and a range of dining options.

hotels_card.title: Mondrian Doha
hotels_card.description: Mondrian Doha combines artistic design, luxury, and entertainment, featuring captivating interiors and trendy venues.

hotels_card.alt: Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel
hotels_card.title: Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel
hotels_card.description: Sheraton Grand Doha offers a beachfront retreat with multiple restaurants, pools, and meeting facilities.

hotels_card.title: Budget Accommodations
hotels_card.description: Doha provides a range of budget-friendly hotels and guesthouses, catering to travelers with various budgets.

transport_card.title: Hamad International Airport
transport_card.description: Hamad International Airport (DOH) is Qatar's primary international airport, known for its modern facilities and services.

transport_card.title: Doha Metro
transport_card.description: The Doha Metro is a rapid transit system that connects various parts of the city, making it easy to navigate Doha.

transport_card.title: Public Buses
transport_card.description: Doha's public bus system is an affordable way to get around the city and reach different destinations.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Doha and provide a convenient mode of transportation within the city.
